knimeNode.name: Time Field Extractor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extracts time fields such as year, month, hour, minute from a timestamp and appends the value as integer columns.

fullDescription.intro: Extracts the selected time fields from a timestamp column and appends the values as integer columns. Valid fields are year, month, day, hour, minute, second and millisecond. If the values are not set in the timestamp a missing value is added in the result table.
fullDescription.option: Select the input column containing date/time stamps.
Check if the year should be extracted and appended as an integer column. The name for this column can be specified.
Check if the quarter as a number in [1,4] should be extracted and appended as an integer column. The name for this column can be specified.
Check if the month should be extracted and appended as an integer column. The name for this column can be specified.
Select whether the (English) name of the month should be appended to the output table or the number of the month in [1, 12].
Check if the day of month should be extracted and appended as an integer column. The name for this column can be specified.
Check if the hour of day should be extracted and appended as an integer column. The name for this column can be specified.
Check if the minute should be extracted and appended as an integer column. The name for this column can be specified.
Check if the second should be extracted and appended as an integer column. The name for this column can be specified.
Check if the millisecond should be extracted and appended as an integer column. The name for this column can be specified.

ports.outPort: Input table with extracted time fields appended
